title: Darkness Stout
content: Heavy as hell, fine as wine...

title: Fruity IPA
content: Hints of orange and pomegranate, strong but mildly hoppy

title: The Best Lager
content: Seriously a fine beer, waay better than Yuengling...

content: Excellent summer ale with a refreshing finish

content: ...willing to make it worth your while
